<<<<<<< HEAD
A brief testimony against tale-bearers, whisperers, and back- biters shewing that where they are given ear unto amongst friends, neighbors, and relations, or in any Christian society, such can never live in peace, concord and unity / by William Shewen. Shewen, William, 1631?-1695.
[2], 27 p.
s.n.], [London : Printed in the Year, 1686.
Place of publication from Wing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
=======

s.n.], [London : Printed in the Year, 1686.
